metadata.title: WUS Infra GmbH - Infrastructure of Tomorrow

hero.title: We shape the infrastructure of tomorrow.
hero.subtitle: Experts in network construction, planning and maintenance.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for your infrastructure projects

categories.title: Construction and Expansion of Infrastructure Networks
items: Industrial and railway facilities (incl. traffic areas)
Civil engineering, road construction and path works

categories.title: Planning and Project Implementation
items: Technical concepts, construction drawings and project plans
Project planning, construction management, supervision, quality control

categories.title: Maintenance and Upkeep
items: Maintenance of power, fiber optic, telecommunications and supply networks
Emergency service for smooth network operation

categories.title: Demolition, Earthworks and Transport
items: Transport and disposal according to environmental regulations
